parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of three doubles of the x, y, and z coordinates of the center of mass VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

parameters.name: CoordinateSystemName
parameters.description: Name of the coordinate system in which the center of mass is defined

parameters.name: Config_option
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of configuration names of size Config_numbers; valid only if Config_option = swInConfigurationOpts_e.swSpecifyConfiguration VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

title: IMassProperty.ISetOverrideCenterOfMassValue
description: Overrides the center of mass of the model currently being edited in this part or assembly document.
signature:

returns: True if the center of mass is overridden, false if not
